DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the association of Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA)-related antibodies and periodontal inflammation in subjects at-risk for Rheumatoid Arthritis. Subjects will undergo periodontal and joint examinations, as well as collection of body fluids to measure Rheumatoid Arthritis-related antibodies.
DOC.brief_title: Periodontal Inflammation and Immunity in Preclinical Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Rheumatoid Arthritisantibody positivity (antiCCP) in the absence of arthritis or Early RA <36 months since diagnosis Pregnancy Antibiotic use prior to dental procedures or cleanings Wear dentures <18 years old
